name: Celebrity Dentist Adventure - For Fans of Justin Bieber, Miley Cyrus, Rihanna & Lady Gaga
name_original: Celebrity Dentist Adventure - For Fans of Justin Bieber, Miley Cyrus, Rihanna & Lady Gaga
description:
Welcome to the Celebrity Dentist - Justin Bieber, Miley Cyrus, Rihanna & Lady Gaga Edition.

In this game, these 4 Celebrities visit the dentist... And you are tasked with making their teeth look as shiny and beautiful as always!

Send them home with a shiny set of teeth, or why not customize their look with colors, stamps...Or both! You can even swap tooth shapes too!

Featuring realistic dentist tools such as a drill, plaque removal tool and even a water dispenser!

When finished, you can save your work, email it or even share it to your friends on Twitter!

Get ready for hours of fun, with Celebrity Dentist Adventure!
